title: MasterZ × IOTA Launch Europe’s Next Generation of Builders
description:
Applications Close January 31, 2026

TL;DR:

MasterZ and IOTA are launching a fully online European hackathon (Feb–Mar 2026) that starts with guided learning and leads to building real Web3 products. Top teams present in Berlin, with opportunities for grants, incubation, and long-term ecosystem collaboration.

Blockchain training provider MasterZ and IOTA are introducing a new European hackathon with an online learning and building format. This initiative follows on from the success of earlier events such as last year’s IOTA Moveathon Europe.

The MasterZ × IOTA Hackathon is now accepting applications!.

If you want to learn Web3, build real products, and access concrete opportunities with a leading blockchain foundation, this is your moment.

Apply now before January 31, 2026:https://www.masterzblockchain.com/en/masterz-iota

Europe is entering a new phase of its Web3 journey. A phase focused not on hype, but on real skills, real products, and real outcomes.

The MasterZ × IOTA Hackathon was created exactly for this purpose.

Powered by IOTA and co-organized with MasterZ, this 100% online hackathon is designed to take participants from learning to building, combining structured education, hands-on development, and direct exposure to one of the most advanced decentralized ecosystems in the industry.

Fully online and open to developers and innovators from across Europe, the hackathon will run between February and March 2026, with applications closing on January 31, 2026.

A Hackathon That Starts With Learning, Not Guessing

Most hackathons assume you already know Web3.This one doesn’t.

From February 15 to February 28, 2026, participants will take part in a dedicated live online learning phase, with interactive sessions led by experts from MasterZ and the IOTA ecosystem.

This phase is designed to ensure that even participants with no prior Web3 experience can confidently move into development.

You will learn:

  • Web3 fundamentals and architecture
  • how IOTA enables real-world decentralized applications
  • the basics of the Move programming language
  • how to approach Web3 with a product-first mindset

The result is a level playing field where everyone can focus on building meaningful solutions.

Building Real Web3 Products in March 2026

After the learning phase, the hackathon enters its core stage: the building phase, running throughout March 2026.

Participants will collaborate, design, and develop functional prototypes, supported by mentors and the MasterZ community. The focus is on practical, production-oriented applications, not theoretical experiments.

Projects can target real-world use cases such as:

  • supply chain and logistics
  • digital identity and data verification
  • asset tokenization
  • document tracking and trustless workflows

The objective is simple: build something that could realistically exist beyond the hackathon.

From Online Hackathon to Berlin Demo Day

The journey concludes on March 31, 2026, with the final stage and awards ceremony held in Berlin, Germany.

The Top 5 projects will be invited to an exclusive 3-day trip to Berlin, with flights and accommodation fully covered, to present their solutions directly to the IOTA Foundation.

This private showcase may unlock:

  • grant opportunities
  • tailored acceleration programs
  • long-term collaboration within the IOTA ecosystem

For many teams, this is where a hackathon project becomes a real venture.

Opportunities That Go Beyond Winning

While the Berlin Demo Day is the headline prize, the hackathon is designed to create value for many participants.

Additional opportunities include:

  • Top 10 projects gaining access to incubation and support programs
  • Top 30 builders featured on the MasterZ × IOTA Builders Leaderboard
  • Special awards recognizing excellence in B2B solutions, B2C products, solo projects, team execution, simplicity in design, and community impact

Outstanding participants may also be invited to become mentors in future MasterZ × IOTA Hackathons.

Open to Builders at Every Level

The MasterZ × IOTA Hackathon is open to:

  • aspiring developers starting their Web3 journey
  • Web2 developers transitioning into blockchain
  • experienced builders ready to ship complete solutions

Participants can apply as Starter, Dev, or Pro Builders.

No prior Web3 experience is required, and all tracks are free to join.

Every participant who completes the hackathon will receive an NFT certificate validating their experience as a Web3 builder.

MasterZ × IOTA Hackathon 2026 – Key Dates

Jan 31, 2026: Applications close.
Feb 15–28, 2026: Online learning phase with Web3 and IOTA experts.
Mar 1–30, 2026: Building phase: Develop real Web3 prototypes with mentorship.
Mar 31, 2026: Berlin Demo Day and awards: Top projects showcased, prizes, and opportunities.

Why MasterZ and IOTA Are Building This Together

MasterZ is Europe’s leading Web3 education and talent acceleration platform, with over 5,000 talents trained and a community of 12,000+ builders across Europe.

IOTA is a public digital infrastructure that connects global economies onchain, enabling the coordination of data, assets, and identities to unlock innovation and growth.

Together, they share one mission: build Europe’s next generation of Web3 professionals, equipped with real skills and real opportunities.

Final Call: Applications Close January 31, 2026

If you want to:

  • learn Web3 the right way
  • build real products
  • present your work to a leading blockchain foundation
  • and unlock concrete career or startup opportunities

this is your chance.

Applications close on January 31, 2026. Apply now at: https://www.masterzblockchain.com/en/masterz-iota

The post MasterZ × IOTA Launch Europe’s Next Generation of Builders appeared first on IOTA News.
